## Bio

Tiernan Martin leads the land use policy research program at [Futurewise](https://futurewise.org). He focuses on the advancement of healthy, affordable, vibrant urban neighborhoods in the Puget Sound region. His approach combines expertise in geospatial data science, understanding of regulatory frameworks and processes, and experience collaborating with community leaders and local organization staff. He engages in research and advocacy with neighborhood groups, community organizations, advocacy groups, academic researchers, and government bodies.
